actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to codify the requirements for appointment, qualifications, and pay for therapeutic medical physicists of the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.
short_title: Department of Veterans Affairs Therapeutic Medical Physicist Pay Cap Relief Act
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text:
Department of Veterans Affairs Therapeutic Medical Physicist Pay Cap Relief Act

This bill provides statutory authority for the requirements for appointment, the qualifications, and the pay scale for therapeutic medical physicists of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

titles.title: Department of Veterans Affairs Therapeutic Medical Physicist Pay Cap Relief Act
Department of Veterans Affairs Therapeutic Medical Physicist Pay Cap Relief Act

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to codify the requirements for appointment, qualifications, and pay for therapeutic medical physicists of the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.
